content: you can follow the cal for free here 1 the cal will be broken up into 5 parts from 8/14/15 to 9/25/15 here is the schedule the pdf will be updated as we go week 0 this post 2 pick a size and gather supplies week 1 this post 3 gauge and giveaway info week 2 8/28/15 bottom week 3 9/5/15 fronts back and trim week 4 9/11/15 sleeves week 5 9/18/15 blocking and seams week 6 9/25/15 yarn giveaway winner is announced sizes xs s m l 1x 2x 3x bust 28 32 36 40 44 48 52 finished bust 34 38 42 46 50 54 58 *garment modeled in size s on a 35 bust 1 http //ktandthesquid com/2015/08/13/kram-cardi-cal-design-reveal-and-supply-list-kt-and-the-squid/ 2 http //ktandthesquid com/2015/08/13/kram-cardi-cal-design-reveal-and-supply-list-kt-and-the-squid/ 3 http //ktandthesquid com/2015/08/20/kram-cardi-cal-week-1-gauge-kt-and-the-squid/
